=== Declining memberships to restricted teams in Launchpad ===

While we want to keep this team as inclusive as possible, please note that we have a "contributions before membership" policy with our teams.

To start contributing, be in touch with us first; see http://xubuntu.org/contribute/ for more information. Thank you for your interest!

=== Email people who send email to lists without being subscribed ===

'''Your email to Xubuntu mailing lists'''

Hello,

you sent a mail to a Xubuntu mailing list. The message is now approved manually via the moderation queue.

Before sending messages again, we ask you kindly to subscribe to the list. This both gets the mail quicker to the list and saves us from needing to moderate your message.

You can subscribe yourself at: <<BR>>
https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/xubuntu-devel <<BR>>
https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/xubuntu-users

Thanks for your understanding, <<BR>>
[name] <<BR>>
On behalf of mailing list moderators
